description:
Grizzly-camo print adds some bite to mountain bike rides. Moisture-wicking tech keeps things comfortable, and a drop-back hem means the back won’t ride up under a pack or during a big-air move.

  • Moisture wicking Cool Wik polyester is breathable and soft to the touch
  • Raglan sleeves give you unrestricted range of motion
  • Drop back hem adds coverage
name: Sombrio Grom's Chaos Long Sleeve Jersey - Youths
